here's more about me

I'm a year 11 IB student at UCC. While trying to survive, I'm dedicated to learning new things, helping others with what I can, and attempting to make the best out of high school. I'm particularly intrigued by biology and how it crosses with policies and technology (specifically computer science).

During my downtime, I really like to research, build, and create (very questionable) stuff that vary in subject matter - I draw a webcomic, compose music, blog, design experiments, and I particularly enjoy coding programs (or websites like this).

I also value education, learning, and believe everyone should have the right to access free and high-quality education. I spend some of my time tutoring, hosting events, and running a not-for-profit organization supporting students in need.
